feed.title: Category: survey | The Blog of Marc Gayle

entry.title: Doing a Quick Survey
entry.content:
I am doing a quick survey to try and figure out the 'Tiny Frustrations' that people face during their 9-to-5. It is the little frustrations that make you say "there has got to be a better/easier way to do this".

Tell me about those here (Don't worry, just 6 questions with some multiple choice =))

http://bit.ly/G10wO
